akas: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (original title)
akas from release info: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (original title)

1.title: Challenging the Elite Ten

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Soma meets elite ten and challenge for them. The 7th seat of elite ten said if soma can impress them then he will accept the shokugeki.

2.title: Ma and La

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Soma chances upon Erina, Alice, and Hisako and decides to make them taste test his Mapo Doufu, which he plans to complete with Kuga with. Megumi decides she will help Soma in his booth for the Moon Banquet Festival.

3.title: Moon Festival

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The Moon Festival finally begins. The dish that Soma decides to make for his stand are black pepper buns that are made in a stone oven. However, the crowd keeps going over to the more luxurious Chinese cuisine RS's stand instead. Soma ends up in the red on the first day. Since students who end up with losses during this school festival will be expelled, Soma is already in trouble. Will he be able to turn things around?.

4.title: Pride of Young Lions

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Soma continues his assault against Kuga's restaurant. As the last day comes, Soma has pulled together everything he's experimented on during the festival. Just as things start to get busy, he gets some help.

5.title: The Darkening Dinner Table

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The final day of the Moon Festival is here. Soma and Kuga's battle finally draws to a close--who will emerge the victor? After closing up shop in the Central Area, Soma and Megumi accept Rindo's invitation to go to Tsukasa Eishi's booth in the Yamanote Area. What kind of food will be served by the first seat?

6.title: The Imprisoned Queen

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The news of Azami's new posting spreads like wildfire around the school, much to the shock of the students and the public. Sanzaemon meets with Soma, and the former director reflects on Erina's childhood as a happy little girl and how she was brainwashed, and isolated by Azami. He begs Soma to save Erina.

7.title: It Begins

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The polar star dormitory is in trouble after the administration changes and Yukihira challenges the one in power to an impossible Shokugeki.

8.title: The Alchemist

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Yukihira and the 9th seat fight it out in a battle of palettes and preserving the natural flavors of Satsuma chicken. Soma uses his learnings from the Polar Star Dormitory to save the dormitory.

9.title: Hunting the Survivors

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Members of various food societies go against the Elite Ten to save their societies from getting closed. The Polar Star Dormitory attends the shokugekis while stopping Yukihira from getting involved into another Shokugeki.

10.title: The Salmon Will Dance

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: As Ryo prepares his dish, it is revealed that Rentaro is an expert in low temperature cooking and makes use of a combi steamer and cryomill to create a salmon confit flamme with a side of salmon ice cream. Ryo responds by baking a coulibiac.

11.title: Der Weiße Ritter der Tafel

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Tsukasa, the first seat of the Elite Ten, reveals Nakiri Azami's plan which is to destroy all the restaurants of Japan and make Japan's culinary perfect with his own restaurants. Since this includes Yukihira Diner, Souma challenges him to a Shokugeki with the conditions of either winning the first seat of the Elite Ten if he wins, or joining The Central as Tsukasa's right hand if he loses.

12.title: The One Who Aims for the Summit

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Soma and Tsukasa finish their dishes, with Soma making a charcoal grilled venison thigh with sweet chestnut sauce, while Tsukasa makes roast venison back strap with peppercorn and berry sauce. Erina, Hisako, and Megumi acts as judges. Afterwards, Azami comes to the Polar Star Dormitory.

13.title: Advancement Exam

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: The 1st years at Totsuki are facing the biggest event of the 2nd semester, The Advancement Exam. This year, however, their is an added twist as those who won't obey Azami's regime will face elimination.

14.title: Onward on the Totsuki Train

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: The advancement exam traditionally takes place in Hokkaido every year, so Erina holds a special lesson on Hokkaido ingredients to the Polar Star members.

15.title: Jeanne d'Arc Rises

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: The Rebels get past the first exam. The next exam uses noodles, but Central does their best to prevent the Rebels from getting any noodles to begin with.

16.title: Revenge Rematch

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: In the third exam, students are to battle Totsuki elite ten members. Soma is up against the newest member, Akira Hayama, who joined the council recently. Their exam will begin in 3 days' time with a main ingredient of bear meat, which Soma has no experience with.

17.title: The Umami Tightrope

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Some questions Hayama's motivations for joining Central. After speaking with Dojima, Soma confronts Hayama. The day of the match finally arrives.

18.title: For Whom

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Soma and Hayama begin their revenge match. After the initial taste test, Hayama's dish surpasses Soma's dish. However, Soma's dish is not complete yet.

19.title: Declaration of War

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Hisako, Alice and Kurokiba all failed the third exam and were expelled. In desperation, Erina directly negotiate with Azami but her pleas are not taken seriously. Soma also challenges Azami for the seat at the elite ten. Like Erina, his challenge was also brushed away but the situation changes entirely when a certain person appears at the scene.

20.title: Erina's Diligent Studies

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: In order to prepare themselves for the upcoming Régiment du Cuisine, Soma and the others divide into 2 teams for practice battle. While they are not allowed to speak under the rule, the team leader Dojima prepares a dish but to everyone's confusion, he improvises from the recipe. As Takumi tries to understand Dojima's intention, he recalls back to the events at Stagiaire Challenge.

21.title: The Pioneer of the Wastelands

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: 23 years ago, Polar Star dormitory lead by Saiba Joichiro and Dojima Gin was known as the strongest of all Totsuki Academy. Joichiro's creative dishes have won many competitions and recognized by many, however, he had unsettling feeling inside him..

22.title: To the Final Battleground

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: The day of the Regiment de Cuisine is here. Soma has selected 8 best members to defeat the central. After Azami and Erina's discussion, it was decided that Soma, Isshiki and Megishima will fight in the 1st BOUT. Soma is up against Kinokuni Nene, the 6th seat in Central and also an expert in "Soba" noodles. What will the Shokugeki theme be!?

23.title: Bearing Polar Star Dormitory

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Excitement rises as the judges arrive at the venue of the Regiment de Cuisine. Isshiki is up against the 8th seat and Italian cuisine specialist Shiratsu Julio. His rivalry for carefully Isshiki is apparent but what's the reason behind it? Julio's dish is ready first. What will the judges reaction be!?

24.title: The Basis for Strength

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: 3rd and final battle between Soma and Nene is heating up, as they are putting everything they've got in the dish. As the theme of shokugeki being Soba, Nene is in her element and finishes first. Her dish is highly praised by the judges so what will Soma cook up to turn the situation around!?

1.title: An Endless Wasteland

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Yukihira is a popular neighborhood restaurant where Yukihira Soma helps out in the hopes of surpassing his father as a chef one day. But land sharks are after their restaurant, and one day Soma tells them that the restaurant will close if they couldn't serve satisfactory food to their customers. The land sharks are only too happy to sabotage the restaurant's fridge and gleefully orders Soma to serve them a meat dish.

2.title: God's Tongue

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Under his father's orders, Soma attempts to transfer into Togetdu Tea House Cullinery Academy. There he meets a student, Nakiri Erina possess the best palate: the God Tomgue.

3.title: The Chef That Doesn't Smile

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: After barely passing the entrance exam, Soma inadvertently alienates his new classmates with a thoughtless announcement. Later, he's matched up with an at-risk student desperate to stay in school.

4.title: Maria of the Polar Star

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: After his classes, Yukihira has to take a test to get into his dorm. There he meets his dorm mates, and is tested upon by one.

5.title: The Ice Queen and the Spring Storm

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Eager to join the Elite Ten, Soma challenges Isshiki Satoshi-the only other second-year student from the high school division-to a cook-off. But Soma quickly discovers there is more to the challenge than he anticipated.

6.title: The Meat Invader

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Soma while looking at food clubs is drawn to the Donmono Research Society. He and Megumi decide to check it out, but find the club leader, Konishi losing over is failing club.

7.title: A Quite Don, an Eloquent Don

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Mito Ikumi and Yukihira Soma go head to head at the Shokugeki! Ikumi, known as "the Meat Master", seems to have the whole crowd on his side. In order to save the Don RS, Soma has to prove himself a worthy opponent.

8.title: Concerto of Ideas and Creations

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: A brutal training camp is underway to whittle down new students, but those in Polar Star Dorm are determined to survive. Trying to survive Soma may have met his match.

9.title: The Coating That Colors the Mountain

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Soma and his teammates are challenged with making a Japanese dish using only locally available ingredients. Inspired by the challenge, Soma grabs Megumi and heads off to go "shopping".

10.title: The Supreme Recette

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The Polar Star Members have survived the first day of camp. Megumi finds her confidence by successfully supporting Soma. The next day the duo will have to get passed Shinomiya, who already expelled 30 students the previous day.

11.title: The Magician That Came from the East

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Hoping to save Megumi from expulsion, Soma challenges Shinomiya to a Shokugeki. After Shinomiya refuses, Dojima forces him to accept, with one condition: Megumi must be the main chef, and if they lose, Soma and Megumi will BOTH be expelled!

12.title: Memories of a Dish

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: With their expulsion on the line, the unofficial Shokugeki between the Megumi-Soma pair and Shinomiya begins. The first challenge: the Rainbow Terrine, made from seven types of vegetables. Megumi, the main chef, steps up to the plate ... literally.

13.title: The Eggs Before Dawn

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: On the third night of camp they are given a new trail for the next morning: to come up with a menu item that uses eggs.

14.title: Metamorphose

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: In the egg-based buffet challenge, the student's must convince guests to consume all 200 servings-in only two hours! The problem is, Soma's souffle omelets keep falling before anyone has a chance to eat them.

15.title: The Man Called Demon

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Now that training camp is over, the remaining students return to Totsuki Academy. But when Soma misses his bus, he finds himself in a car with Erina, who informs him of the impending Autumn Elections.

16.title: The Chef Who's Crossed a Thousand Leagues

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: It's a family affair, literally, when Soma's father, Joichiro, appears unexpectedly at Polar Star ... and Soma soon learns some surprising truths about his father's past.

17.title: The Seductive Karaage

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Soma returns home to discover a swarm of people waiting for Yukihira to reopen, and he is more than happy to serve them. But things take a turn when he learns that a new shopping complex threatens to steal his customers.

18.title: The Karaage of Youth

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: With Sumire Avenue Shopping District under threat of extinction thanks to the karaage specialty store, Soma enlists Kurase and Nikumi to help save the restaurant with a totally new concept: the Walk-n-Eat Karaage.

19.title: The Chosen One

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: The names of the students who'll participate in the Autumn Elections are posted in Totsuki Academy as the 1st semester draws to a close. Those on the list are given a special assigned topic where they have to make a curry dish.

20.title: The Dragon Lies Down and Ascends the Skies

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: With the challenge of creating a curry dish set, many of the contestants set off to visit their families and study up on spices during the remainder of the summer while Soma stays at the dorms to try out various combinations. The Autumn Election preliminaries soon arrive, with only the top four from each group able to make it through to the tournament phase. As each of the contestants start bringi

21.title: The Unknown Known

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: The Autumn Elections preliminaries have begun. The top 4 students from the tournament will advance to the main tournament.

22.title: The One Who Surpasses the Ordinary

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: As judging begins, Hisako, Takumi, and other members of Group B are already winning big. But with Megumi's dish the last one on the judging table, can she pull an upset and take the top spot?

23.title: The Competition of the Blossoming Individuals

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Alice, Hisako, Takumi and Megumi are all on track to make it through the round, but in Group A, Sendawara Natsume keeps scoring contestants with 0's! Later, Alice's aide, Kurokiba Ryo finally reveals his true colors.

24.title: The Banquet of Warriors

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: At the final round of the preliminaries, both Megumi and Soma are overshadowed by a very unlikely opponent: Kurokiba-who appears out of nowhere to claim the top spot. Can Megumi and Soma unseat him?

1.title: What Fills the Box

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Soma and Nakiri Alice are first up in the Fall Elections' main tournament. With the theme being bento, it is up to Soma to craft the ultimate dish.

2.title: The Interplay of Light and Shadow

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: With resolve and her newfound ability to keep a cool head, Megumi prepares to face Ryo in the next battle: ramen. These opposite personalities clash through their dishes!

3.title: The Generation of Prodigies

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The winner of Ryo and Megumi's battle is announced. Immediately after that, the master of medicinal cuisine, Hisako, goes head to head against the spice master, Hayama.

4.title: The Pursuer

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Subaru Mimasaka has a habit of stalking people to get in their heads, challenging them and then taking their prized tools. Will Takumi's mezzaluna be next?

5.title: The Secret in the First Bite

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Soma's semi-final match against Mimasaka begins. With not only his tools, but also his future as a chef at risk, Soma prepares to fight Mimasaka's version of him.

6.title: Dawn Will Come Again

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The battle between Soma and Mimasaka begins! Immediately, Mimasaka's mimicry of Soma's dish comes into play. Can Soma beat this detail oriented "mirror" chef?

7.title: Beasts Devouring Each Other

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: After Soma's victory in the first round of the semi-finals, the second round between Ryo and Akira begins. Who will advance?

8.title: Battle of Seasonality

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Soma finds himself in a strange place as the finals approach. Testing out recipes might be the last thing he has to worry about compared to the knowledge he lacks.

9.title: A Sword That Signals Autumn

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: The finals are on! With an unprecedented three-way battle ahead, Soma seems like the underdog compared to Hayama and Kurokiba. Can he even finish in time?

10.title: A New Genius

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: In the last act of the competition, Soma's creation falls short. However, his dish has a secret twist, but is it enough to win against Hayama and Ryo's masterpieces?

11.title: The Stagiaire

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: The Totsuki students are sent off for practical experience, and Soma lands in a (very) busy family restaurant with Erina's secretary Arata! Can these two even work together?!

12.title: The Magician Once More

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Soma's been sent to work under Shinomiya at his newest restaurant. However, the grueling work exposes Soma's lack of skill in the French kitchen, putting his future at risk.

13.title: Pomp and Circumstance

episode of.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: After the soft opening, SHINO'S has one more set of important customers for Soma to serve: Shinomiya's Totsuki Academy peers! The final act: the new menu item competition.

imdb.plot outline: Yukihira Soma is a teen with a great enthusiasm for cooking. He dreams of surpassing his father, a great chef and restaurant owner, and so attends Totsuki Culinary Academy, a legendary and formidable cooking school for the greatest teenage chefs in Japan.
imdb.title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma
plot: Yukihira Soma is a teen with a great enthusiasm for cooking. He dreams of surpassing his father, a great chef and restaurant owner, and so attends Totsuki Culinary Academy, a legendary and formidable cooking school for the greatest teenage chefs in Japan.

camera: Arri Alexa XT Plus, Cooke 5/i and Fujinon Premier Lenses
